item.title: Amanda the Adventurer 2 coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, and Switch on October 16
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Catch up on the story ahead of the final chapter.

Publisher DreadXP and developer MANGLEDmaw Games will release horror game Amanda the Adventurer 2 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch on October 16 for $9.99, the companies announced.

Amanda the Adventurer 2 first launched for PC via Steam on October 22, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via DreadXP:

About

Amanda the Adventurer 2 follows Riley Park, who, after seeing what was contained on the mysterious tapes in their attic, is greeted by a masked figure. The figure claims to have known their Aunt Kate before she died and needs their help finding something Aunt Kate left in the library. The duo travel to the Kensdale Public Library to investigate further. The masked figure also warns of a powerful entity that seems to be drawn to the tapes.

Meanwhile, Amanda is now aware of Riley’s presence, and is doing everything to find a way to free herself. Suddenly, the stakes are higher than ever before, as it’s not just Amanda looking for Riley now…

Key Features

  • Interactive Cartoons Return – Talk directly to Amanda like before, but now your input has a bigger effect on her world
  • New Interaction Type: GET UP! – Go out and explore the environment to find something Amanda asks for, or don’t! See how she responds!
  • New Area: Kensdale Public Library – You’re not at Aunt Kate’s anymore! Explore a bigger environment with even more secrets and lore to find!
  • New Friends – Neither Riley or Amanda will be alone on their adventures with friends by their side!
  • Dig Deeper Into the Story – Dig even deeper into the story of Amanda, Riley and Aunt Kate, and the sinister production of Amanda the Adventurer to unfold a horrifying history.

Get ready for an adventure!
